column1: # This file defines default values for files in each folder
# 1. Copy a line from the examples below
# 2. Edit the values for your folder
# - folder_path: Name of the folder in source_files/ (e.g.
# - category_name: The canonical category name to use in output (e.g.
#                  Use this to standardize categories even if folder names vary
# - creative_description: Default name if filename doesn't have one (e.g.
# - folder_path = actual folder name on disk
# - category_name = what appears in the output (keeps categories uniform)
# - Multiple folders can map to the same category_name for standardization
# - You can edit this file in Excel
# - Don't use commas in your values (they're CSV separators)

column2: the script will ask you for the info interactively
